casebody.data:
UNITED CHROMIUM, Incorporated, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION, The New Departure Manufacturing Company, and The Bassick Company, Defendants-Appellants. No. 436. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 7, 1936. For former opinion, see 85 F.(2d) 577. Drury W. Cooper, Merrell E. Clark, and Allan C. Bakewell, all of New York City, for appellants.. Thomas G. Haight, of Jersey City, N. J., and George F. Scull, Gustave R. Thompson, and Newton A. Burgess, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree reversed.
